ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Truly it is revelation sent down by the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And this (Qur'an) is a revelation from the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed this is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: This, (Quran), is certainly the revelation from the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed this Qur’an has been sent down by the Lord Of The Creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And truly, this is a revelation from the Lord of all that exists,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely this is a revelation from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Truly it is the revelation of the Lord of all Being,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! it is a revelation of the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This surely is a revelation from the Lord of the Universe:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily it is a revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is indeed [a Book] sent down by the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily this is a Revelation from the Lord of the Worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And truly, this (the Quran) is a revelation from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Truly, it is the sending of the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: It is a revelation from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, the Qur'an is the revelation of the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:192] Truly it, the Qur’ān, is the revelation of the Lord of the Worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! it is) i.e. the Qur'an (a revelation) an address (of the Lord of the Worlds),
